item.title: Books
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: ðŸ“• Jagjeevan Living Larger than Life ðŸ“• Jagjeevan: Living Larger Than Life is a heartfelt tribute to the extraordinary life and timeless wisdom of Shri Jagguramâ€”an enlightened soul whose values shaped generations. Blending personal memories with profound life lessons, it captures the essence of a man who lived with humility, discipline, compassion, and unwavering purpose. Through ten insightful chapters, the book explores heritage, resilience, responsibility, inner strength, family unity, conflict resolution, gratitude, and the power of oneâ€™s actions.

item.title: Patents and Papers
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: This listing includes patent applications that are pending as well as patents that have already been granted by the United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO). It also includes the papers published in various conferences and journals. ITU-T Technical Report - Potential requirements of IoT-based Perishable Goods Monitoring System ITU-T Study Group 20 accepted my recommendation as a Technical Report. It defines key layers for IoT-based retail monitoring systems â€” including Sensing, Communication, Integration, Application & Analytics, and Management & Maintenance layers.

item.title: Open-sources and Apps
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: Gen AI Hands On Practices Google Colab Hands-on practice for developing Gen AI applications, and understanding the concepts. â˜ž Github â˜ž Learn More SSO Proxy A lightweight proxy tool for accessing APIs and websites that require SSO authentication. It uses Puppeteer to open a browser window for login and then reuses the authenticated cookies to access the proxied URL. This tool is particularly helpful for: Showcasing integration with portal APIs that require SSO (before SSO is actually set up).
